```{r setup}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,
               magrittr,
               RColorBrewer,
               wesanderson)
```

```{r blob1}
expand.grid(x = c(1:500), y = c(1:200)) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(col = round(x/120)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = 1- sin(x)*y^2, y = 1+cos(y) - x^(2 *runif(1, 1, 5)), col = as.factor(col))) + 
  geom_point(alpha = .2, shape = 20, size = .7) + 
  coord_polar() + 
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  scale_color_manual(values = wes_palette("Darjeeling1"))
#remove coord_polar
#change () in y or
```
